documentation.subtitle: Raadi hagayaal iyo agab kaa caawinaya inaad si fiican uga faa'iidaysato Contentry. Dooro hage ku salaysan doorkaaga.

whatsNew.title: Maxaa Cusub
whatsNew.description: Si toos ah ayaa loo ogaaday cusbooneysiinta iyo astaamaha cusub ee lagu daray madal
whatsNew.subtitle: Si toos ah ayaa loo ogaaday isbeddellada iyo cusbooneysiinta madal
whatsNew.feature1: Isbeddellada UI ee si otomaatig ah loo ogaan karo

adminGuide.title: Hagaha Maamulka
adminGuide.description: Hagaha oo dhammaystiran oo loogu talagalay maamulayaasha madal. Baro sida loo maareeyo isticmaalayaasha, loola socdo falanqaynta, iyo loo habeeyo dejimaha nidaamka.

enterpriseGuide.title: Hagaha Ganacsiga
enterpriseGuide.description: Hagaha maamulayaasha shirkadda. Baro sida loo maareeyo kooxdaada, loo dejiyo saldhigyo aqooneed, iyo sida loo maareeyo oggolaanshaha macluumaadka.

userGuide.title: Hagaha Isticmaalaha
userGuide.description: Wax kasta oo aad u baahan tahay si aad u abuurto, u falanqeyso, una daabacdo macluumaadka. Ku habboon abuurayaasha macluumaadka iyo suuqgeeyayaasha.

sections.overview: Dulmar Guud oo ku saabsan Madal

overview.intro: Maamule ahaan madal, waxaad heli kartaa qalab dhammaystiran oo loogu talagalay la socodka iyo maaraynta madal Contentry oo dhan. Hagahan ayaa kaa caawin doona inaad fahamto awoodahaaga maamul.
overview.dashboardDesc: Dashboard-ka Maamulka wuxuu bixiyaa aragti shimbireed oo ku saabsan dhaqdhaqaaqa goobta iyo caafimaadka.
overview.feature1: La socodka dhaqdhaqaaqa isticmaalaha waqtiga-dhabta ah
overview.feature4: Helitaan degdeg ah oo loogu talagalay hawlaha maamulka ee muhiimka ah
overview.tip: Booqo Dashboard-ka Maamulka si joogto ah si aad ula socoto isbeddellada madal oo aad u ogaato arrimaha iman kara goor hore.

userManagement.intro: Maareynta isticmaaluhu waa shaqo maamul oo aasaasi ah oo kuu oggolaanaysa inaad kormeerto dhammaan isticmaaleyaasha iyo ganacsiyada ku jira madal.
userManagement.viewUsersDesc: Gal qaybta Maareynta Isticmaalaha si aad u aragto, u raadiso, una maamusho dhammaan isticmaalayaasha goobta.
userManagement.feature1: Raadi oo shaandhee dadka isticmaala magaca, iimaylka, ama doorka
userManagement.feature2: Fiiri boggaga isticmaalaha iyo taariikhda dhaqdhaqaaqa oo faahfaahsan
userManagement.feature3: Wax ka beddel doorarka iyo rukhsadaha isticmaalaha
userManagement.feature4: Dami ama tirtir akoonnada isticmaalaha marka loo baahdo
userManagement.rolesDesc: Contentry wuxuu leeyahay saddex door oo muhiim ah oo isticmaalaha ah:
userManagement.role1: Maamule: Helitaanka madal oo dhammaystiran oo leh awoodaha habaynta nidaamka
userManagement.role2: Maamulaha Ganacsiga: Waxay maamushaa kooxda iyo dejimaha shirkadooda
userManagement.role3: Isticmaalaha: Astaamaha abuurista macluumaadka caadiga ah iyo falanqaynta
userManagement.warning: Had iyo jeer xaqiiji saameynta ka hor intaadan beddelin doorarka isticmaalaha ama tirtirin akoonnada. Ficilladani waxay saameyn karaan socodka shaqada kooxda.

analytics.intro: Falanqaynta waxay bixisaa aragtiyo qoto dheer oo ku saabsan sida madal loogu isticmaalo dhammaan shirkadaha iyo isticmaalayaasha.
analytics.metric1: Wadarta isticmaaleyaasha firfircoon iyo isbeddellada kobaca
analytics.metric5: U hoggaansanaanta iyo dhibcaha khatarta ee shirkadaha oo dhan
analytics.tip: Warbixinnada falanqaynta ee loogu talagalay bandhigyada daneeyayaasha adoo adeegsanaya sifada Warbixinta Soo dejinta.

financials.intro: Qaybta Guudmarka Maaliyadeed waxay bixisaa muuqaal ku saabsan heerarka dakhliga goobta iyo rukunka.
financials.revenueDesc: La soco caafimaadka maaliyadeed iyo isbeddellada is-diiwaangelinta ee dhammaan shirkadaha.
financials.feature1: Dabagalka Dakhliga Soo Noqnoqda ee Bilaha ah (MRR)

systemConfig.intro: Qaabeynta nidaamku waxay kuu ogolaaneysaa inaad maamusho dejimaha iyo isku-dhafka madal oo dhan.
systemConfig.integrationsDesc: Deji oo la soco isdhexgalka dhinac saddexaad:
systemConfig.integration1: Ayrshare API ee daabacaadda warbaahinta bulshada
systemConfig.integration2: Adeegyada AI ee loogu talagalay soo saarista macluumaadka iyo falanqaynta
systemConfig.integration3: Habaynta lacag bixinta iyada oo loo marayo Stripe
systemConfig.tip: Had iyo jeer tijaabi isku-dhafka jawi diyaarsan ka hor inta aadan isbeddel ku sameyn goobaha wax soo saarka.

gettingStarted.intro: Kusoo dhawoow Contentry! Maadaama aad tahay Maamule Ganacsi, waxaad haysataa qalabka aad ku maamuli karto kooxdaada, aad ku dejin karto tilmaamaha macluumaadka, iyo inaad hubiso joogtaynta sumcadda.
gettingStarted.setupDesc: Raac tallaabooyinkan si aad u dejiso akoonkaaga ganacsiga:
gettingStarted.step1: U gudub Settings > Enterprise si aad u gasho dashboard-ka shirkaddaada
gettingStarted.step2: Soo geli tilmaamaha iyo siyaasadaha summada shirkaddaada Saldhigga Aqoonta
gettingStarted.step3: Ku martiqaad xubnaha kooxdaada oo u qoondee doorar ku habboon
gettingStarted.step4: Hagaaji socodka shaqada ee oggolaanshaha si aad u eegto macluumaadka
gettingStarted.tip: Dhameystir dejintaada Aqoonta ka hor intaadan casuumin xubnaha kooxda si aad u hubiso inay heli karaan tilmaamaha astaanta laga bilaabo maalinta koowaad.

teamManagement.intro: Maareynta kooxda oo wax ku ool ah waxay hubineysaa iskaashi siman iyo xakameyn sax ah oo ku saabsan marin u helka ururkaaga.
teamManagement.inviteDesc: Ku dar xubno cusub kooxdaada ganacsiga:
teamManagement.feature1: Geli cinwaanka iimaylka ee xubinta kooxda
teamManagement.feature3: Ku dar farriin shaqsiyeed ikhtiyaari ah martiqaadka
teamManagement.rolesDesc: Xilka u dhiib iyadoo lagu saleynayo mas'uuliyadaha:
teamManagement.role1: Abuuraha: Wuxuu abuuri karaa oo soo gudbin karaa macluumaadka si loo ansixiyo
teamManagement.role2: Maareeyaha: Wuu ansixin karaa/diidi karaa macluumaadka oo maamuli karaa abuurayaasha
teamManagement.role3: Maamule: Helitaanka ganacsiga oo dhammaystiran oo ay ku jiraan biilasha iyo dejimaha
teamManagement.tip: Casuumaadaha waxay dhacayaan 7 maalmood ka dib. Xusuusi xubnaha kooxda inay si dhakhso ah u aqbalaan casuumaadahooda.

knowledgeBase.intro: Saldhigga Aqoontu waa kaydka dhexe ee shirkaddaada ee tilmaamaha summada, siyaasadaha, iyo xeerarka macluumaadka. Dukumentiyada halkan lagu soo galiyay waxay wargelinayaan macluumaadka ay AI soo saartay dhammaan xubnaha kooxda.
knowledgeBase.uploadDesc: Ku dar dukumeentiyo hagi doona abuurista macluumaadka:
knowledgeBase.docType1: Tilmaamaha qaabka summada iyo tilmaamaha codka
knowledgeBase.tip: Marka hore soo geli tilmaamahaaga summada ugu muhiimsan. AI waxay mudnaanta siisaa dukumentiyada ku jira Saldhigga Aqoonta ee shirkadda marka loo eego soo dejinta isticmaalaha shaqsiga ah.

approvalWorkflow.intro: Habka ansixinta wuxuu hubiyaa in dhammaan waxyaabaha ku jira ay buuxiyaan heerarka shirkaddaada ka hor inta aan la daabicin.
approvalWorkflow.step1: Abuuruhu wuxuu soo saaraa ama falanqeeyaa waxyaabaha ku jira
approvalWorkflow.step2: Macluumaadka waa la gudbiyay si loo ansixiyo (haddii loo baahdo)
approvalWorkflow.step3: Dib u eegista maamulaha iyo bixinta jawaab celin
approvalWorkflow.step4: Waxyaabaha la ansixiyay waxaa lagu daabici karaa baraha bulshada
approvalWorkflow.warning: Awood u yeelo shuruudaha oggolaanshaha ee Dejinta si loo hubiyo in dhammaan waxyaabaha la dib u eegay ka hor inta aan la daabicin.

billing.intro: Maaree rukunka ganacsigaaga oo la soco isticmaalka deynta.
billing.feature1: Faahfaahinta qorshaha hadda jira iyo qoondaynta deynta
billing.feature3: Taariikhda biilka iyo hababka lacag bixinta

adminUsersPage.subtitle: Maamul isticmaalayaasha goobta oo dhan

actions.resetPassword: Dib u celi eraygaaga sirta ah

toasts.deleteFailed: Ku guuldareystay in la tirtiro isticmaalaha
toasts.deleteSuccess: Isticmaalaha si guul leh ayaa loo tirtiray

toasts.updateSuccess: Isticmaalaha si guul leh ayaa loo cusbooneysiiyay

deleteModal.title: Tirtir Isticmaalaha
deleteModal.description: Tani waxay si joogto ah u tirtiri doontaa isticmaalaha iyo dhammaan xogta la xiriirta:

gettingStarted.intro: Kusoo dhawoow Contentry! Tilmaamahan ayaa kaa caawin doona inaad abuurto macluumaad soo jiidasho leh oo waafaqsan iyadoo la adeegsanayo aaladaha ku shaqeeya AI.
gettingStarted.step1: Ku deji profile-kaaga macluumaad sax ah
gettingStarted.step3: U samee Bog Istaraatiijiyadeed astaantaada ama ololahaaga
gettingStarted.step4: Abuur qaybtaada ugu horreysa ee mawduuca
gettingStarted.tip: Ku bilow Bogga Istaraatiijiyadeed si aad u hubiso in dhammaan waxyaabaha aad ka kooban tahay ay sii wadaan codka iyo fariimaha isku midka ah.

contentCreation.intro: Soo saarista macluumaadka ku shaqeeya AI ee Contentry waxay kaa caawineysaa inaad abuurto qoraallo xiiso leh ilbiriqsiyo gudahood.
contentCreation.feature1: Geli mowduuc ama tilmaam qeexaya waxaad rabto inaad ku dhejiso
contentCreation.feature2: Xullo goobaha aad bartilmaameedsaneyso (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, iwm.)
contentCreation.feature4: Ikhtiyaar ahaan u soo saar sawir la socda
contentCreation.schedule1: Samee jadwal soo saarista macluumaadka soo noqnoqda
contentCreation.schedule2: Dooro maalmo iyo waqtiyo gaar ah oo loogu talagalay soo dhejinta otomaatiga ah
contentCreation.schedule3: Daar boostada otomaatiga ah ama dib u eegista gacanta ka hor intaadan daabicin
contentCreation.tip: Isticmaal sanduuqa 'Promotional Content' marka aad samaynayso qoraallada suuqgeynta si aad u hubiso in falanqaynta u hoggaansanaanta ay tixgeliso tilmaamaha xayaysiinta.

analyzeContent.intro: Sifada Falanqaynta Mawduuca waxay dib u eegtaa macluumaadkaaga si loo ogaado u hoggaansanaanta, xasaasiyadda dhaqanka, iyo isku-xidhka summada.
analyzeContent.step1: U gudub Dhexdhexaadinta Mawduuca > Falanqee Mawduuca
analyzeContent.step3: Xullo Bogga Istaraatiijiga ah si aad u hesho macnaha guud
analyzeContent.step4: Guji Falanqeynta si aad u hesho jawaab celin faahfaahsan
analyzeContent.type1: U hoggaansanaanta siyaasadaha iyo tilmaamaha shirkadda
analyzeContent.type2: Xasaasiyadda dhaqanka ee gobollada kala duwan
analyzeContent.type3: Codka summada iyo isku dheelitirnaanta codka
analyzeContent.tip: Had iyo jeer falanqee macluumaadka ka hor inta aadan u daabicin goobaha dibadda, gaar ahaan ololaha lagu beegsanayo gobollo badan.

strategicProfiles.intro: Astaamaha Istaraatiijiyadeed waxay qeexaan macnaha guud, qaabka, iyo tilmaamaha abuurista iyo falanqaynta macluumaadka.
strategicProfiles.feature1: Qeex dadka bartilmaameedka u ah bogga iyo ujeeddada
strategicProfiles.feature3: Soo geli dukumentiyada iyo tilmaamaha gaarka u ah astaanta
strategicProfiles.feature4: Hagaaji qaabka caadiga ah iyo doorbidyada qaabka
strategicProfiles.tip: Samee Astaanta Istaraatiijiyadeed ee kala duwan ee ololaha, noocyada kala duwan, ama suuqyada gobolka.

socialAccounts.intro: Ku xidh akoonnadaada warbaahinta bulshada si aad si toos ah ugu daabacdo waxyaabaha ku jira Contentry.
socialAccounts.connectDesc: Meelaha la taageero waxaa ka mid ah:
socialAccounts.platform1: LinkedIn - Bogagga Shakhsi ahaaneed iyo Shirkadda
socialAccounts.warning: Xiriirada akoonkaaga bulshada ha la cusbooneysiiyo. Calaamadaha dhacay waxay ka hor istaagi karaan qoraallada la qorsheeyay in la daabaco.

approvalProcess.intro: Haddii ganacsigaagu leeyahay socodsiinta shaqada oggolaanshaha oo la oggol yahay, macluumaadka waa in dib loo eegaa ka hor inta aan la daabicin.
approvalProcess.step1: Abuur ama falanqee waxa aad ka hadlayso
approvalProcess.step2: Guji 'Gudbi si aad u Ansixiso' si aad ugu dirto maamulahaaga
approvalProcess.step3: Raadso xaaladda oggolaanshaha safka oggolaanshaha ee sugitaanka
approvalProcess.tip: Ku dar qoraallo marka aad gudbinayso macluumaadka si aad dib u eegis ugu samayso macnaha guud ee go'aannadaada hal-abuurka leh.

aboutGuide.title: Ku saabsan & Dhaqannada ugu Fiican
aboutGuide.description: Baro waxa Contentry loogu talagalay oo soo hel dhaqamada ugu wanaagsan si aad u wanaajiso abuurista macluumaadkaaga, heshiisyada summada, iyo astaamaha saamaynta leh.

whatIsContentry.intro: Contentry waa madal sirdoon macluumaad oo ku shaqeeya AI oo loogu talagalay inay ka caawiso abuurayaasha macluumaadka, suuqgeeyayaasha, iyo shirkadaha inay abuuraan, falanqeeyaan, oo daabacaan macluumaadka waafaqsan miisaan ahaan. Hadday tahay qof saameyn ku leh ama qayb ka ah koox suuqgeyn oo weyn, Contentry waxay fududeysaa socodka shaqadaada macluumaadka.
whatIsContentry.missionDesc: Waxaan aaminsanahay inaan awoodsiino abuureyaasha qalab caqli badan oo hubiya in qayb kasta oo ka mid ah macluumaadka ay tahay mid summad leh, dhaqan ahaan xasaasi ah, iyo mid u hoggaansan tilmaamaha madal.
whatIsContentry.benefit1: Soo saarista macluumaadka ku shaqeeya AI-ga oo la jaanqaada codkaaga astaantaada
whatIsContentry.benefit2: Hubinta u hoggaansanaanta waqtiga-dhabta ah ee shuruudaha sharciyeed
whatIsContentry.benefit3: Falanqaynta xasaasiyadda dhaqanka ee dhagaystayaasha adduunka
whatIsContentry.benefit4: Shaqooyinka oggolaanshaha ee la fududeeyay ee kooxaha ganacsiga
whatIsContentry.tip: Contentry wuxuu isku daraa awoodda AI iyo kormeerka aadanaha si loo bixiyo macluumaad la jaanqaadaya dhagaystayaashaada iyadoo la ilaalinayo.

keyFeatures.intro: Contentry waxay bixisaa qalab dhammaystiran oo lagu maareeyo wareeggaaga nololeed oo dhan:
keyFeatures.aiContentDesc: Abuur waxyaabo tayo sare leh oo loogu talagalay astaantaada iyo dhagaystayaashaada:
keyFeatures.aiFeature1: Samaynta macluumaad badan oo madal ah (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
keyFeatures.aiFeature2: Codad qoraal ah oo la habeyn karo (Xirfad, Caadi ah, Dhiirigelin leh)
keyFeatures.aiFeature3: Sameynta sawirka AI si ay ula socoto qoraalladaada
keyFeatures.complianceDesc: Hubi in macluumaadkaagu uu buuxiyo dhammaan shuruudaha ka hor intaadan daabicin:
keyFeatures.complianceFeature1: Hubinta u hoggaansanaanta otomaatiga ah ee ka dhanka ah siyaasadaha shirkadda
keyFeatures.complianceFeature2: Dhibcaha xasaasiyadda dhaqanka ee dhagaystayaasha caalamiga ah
keyFeatures.complianceFeature3: Qiimaynta khatarta iyadoo la adeegsanayo talooyin wax ku ool ah
keyFeatures.tip: Adeegso Astaamaha Istaraatiijiga ah si aad u hubiso in codka summadaysan uu yahay mid joogto ah dhammaan waxyaabaha la soo saaray.

bestPractices.intro: Raacitaanka dhaqamadan ugu wanaagsan waxay kaa caawin doonaan inaad ka faa'iidaysato Contentry oo aad abuurto waxyaabo si fiican u shaqeeya:
bestPractices.workflowTitle: Samee Hab-socod Shaqo oo Mawduuc ah
bestPractices.workflowDesc: Shaqo joogto ah ayaa hubisa tayada iyo hufnaanta:
bestPractices.workflow1: Ku bilow inaad dejiso Boggaaga Istaraatiijiga ah oo leh tilmaamaha astaanta
bestPractices.workflow2: Abuur macluumaad iyadoo maskaxda lagu hayo madal gaar ah iyo dhagaystayaal
bestPractices.workflow3: Had iyo jeer falanqee macluumaadka ka hor intaadan u daabicin goobaha dibadda
bestPractices.workflow4: Adeegso sifooyinka jadwalka si aad u ilaaliso caddeynta boostada oo joogto ah
bestPractices.consistencyDesc: Sumcad-samayn joogto ah ayaa dhista kalsooni iyo aqoonsi:
bestPractices.consistency1: Soo geli hagaha qaabka summadaada Saldhigga Aqoonta
bestPractices.consistency2: Isticmaal isla Profile Istaraatiijiyadeed ee ololaha la xiriira
bestPractices.consistency3: Dib u eeg macluumaadka ay soo saarto AI si aad u hubiso inuu la mid yahay codkaaga
bestPractices.warning: Had iyo jeer dib u eeg waxyaabaha ay soo saarto AI ka hor intaadan daabicin. In kasta oo AI-gayagu uu awood badan yahay, haddana kormeerka aadanaha ayaa hubiya natiijooyinka ugu fiican.

optimizeContent.intro: Abuuritaanka macluumaad aad u wanaagsan waa bilow. Waa kan sida loo hagaajiyo ka qaybgalka ugu badan:
optimizeContent.platformDesc: Madal kastaa waxay leedahay shuruudo gaar ah iyo filashooyinka dhagaystayaasha:
optimizeContent.platform1: LinkedIn: Diiradda saar aragtida xirfadeed, isticmaal ereyada muhiimka ah ee warshadaha, qaab dheer oo la aqbali karo
optimizeContent.platform2: Twitter/X: Fariimo kooban, isticmaal hashtags si istaraatiiji ah, la falgal mowduucyada soo socda
optimizeContent.platform3: Facebook: Muuqaalku si fiican ayuu u shaqeeyaa, wuxuuna dhiirigeliyaa ka-qaybgalka bulshada
optimizeContent.platform4: Instagram: Muuqaallo tayo sare leh ayaa muhiim ah, isticmaal hashtags khuseeya, Sheekooyinka loogu talagalay ka-qaybgalka
optimizeContent.engagement1: Si joogto ah u soo dheji waqtiyada ugu habboon ee dhagaystayaashaada
optimizeContent.engagement2: Ku isticmaal wicitaano-ficil oo xiiso leh macluumaadkaaga
optimizeContent.engagement3: Ka jawaab faallooyinka oo la falgal bulshadaada
optimizeContent.engagement4: La soco falanqaynta si aad u fahamto waxa ugu fiican ee ay ka kooban tahay
optimizeContent.tip: Adeegso qaabka jadwalka Contentry si aad u soo dhigto waqtiyada ugu habboon adiga oo aan gacanta ku dadaalin.

brandDeals.intro: Iskaashiga summadaha waxay noqon karaan durdur dakhli oo muhiim ah. Waa kan sida loo hagaajiyo habkaaga:
brandDeals.preparationDesc: Diyaar u noqo marka fursado soo baxaan:
brandDeals.prep1: Hayso faylal macluumaad oo xirfad leh oo joogto ah
brandDeals.prep2: La soco oo soo bandhig cabbirada ka-qaybgalkaaga
brandDeals.prep3: Dhis qalab warbaahineed oo leh tirakoobkaaga oo la xiriir dadka aad la xiriireyso.
brandDeals.prep4: Adeegso Contentry si aad u soo saarto tusaalooyin tusaalooyin ah oo ku saabsan mawduucyada summadaysan
brandDeals.pitchingDesc: Ka dhig hadalladaadu kuwo soo jiidasho leh:
brandDeals.pitch1: La jaanqaado hadalkaaga qiimaha summada iyo dhagaystayaasha bartilmaameedka ah
brandDeals.pitch2: Bixi fikrado mawduuc gaar ah halkii aad ka bixin lahayd soo-jeedinno guud
brandDeals.pitch3: Ku dar falanqaynta u hoggaansanaanta si aad u muujiso in waxa ku jira uu waafaqsan yahay tilmaamaha
brandDeals.tip: Isticmaal hubinta u hoggaansanaanta Contentry marka aad samaynayso macluumaadka la kafaala qaaday si aad u hubiso in shuruudaha shaacinta FTC iyo goobta la buuxiyay.

influencerProfiles.intro: Boggaaga Istaraatiijiga ah waa aasaaska istaraatiijiyaddaada macluumaadka. Waa kan sida loo hagaajiyo:
influencerProfiles.setupDesc: Astaan si fiican loo habeeyey waxay hubisaa waxyaabaha joogtada ah ee ku jira astaanta:
influencerProfiles.setup1: Qeex niche-gaaga oo si cad u bartilmaameedso dhagaystayaasha
influencerProfiles.setup2: Deji qaabka iyo qaabka qoraalka aad doorbidayso
influencerProfiles.setup3: Ku dar tixgelin dhaqameed iyo goboleed dhagaystayaashaada
influencerProfiles.setup4: Soo geli dukumeentiyada tixraaca ee qeexaya codkaaga astaanta ganacsiga
influencerProfiles.optimizeDesc: Si joogto ah u hagaaji boggaaga si aad u hesho natiijooyin wanaagsan:
influencerProfiles.optimize1: Dib u eeg macluumaadka la soo saaray oo hagaaji dejimaha astaanta haddii loo baahdo
influencerProfiles.optimize2: Abuur astaan badan oo loogu talagalay ololeyaal ama dhagaystayaal kala duwan
influencerProfiles.optimize3: Ku hay Xarunta Aqoontaada mid la cusbooneysiiyay iyadoo la raacayo tilmaamaha summada ugu dambeeyay
influencerProfiles.tip: Dib u eeg boggaaga Istaraatiijiga ah saddexdii biloodba mar si aad u hubiso inuu ka tarjumayo sumcaddaada iyo dhagaystayaashaada isbeddelaya.

workflowsGuide.title: Hagaha Socodka Shaqada & Dhibcaha
workflowsGuide.description: Baro sida nidaamka dhibcaha u shaqeeyo oo faham tallaabo kasta oo shaqo-socod ah laga bilaabo falanqaynta macluumaadka ilaa oggolaanshaha.

scoring.intro: Nidaamka dhibcaha ee Contentry wuxuu bixiyaa dhibco hufan oo ku salaysan ganaax si uu kaaga caawiyo inaad fahamto sida macluumaadkaagu u shaqeeyo. Dhammaan dhibcaha waxay ka bilaabmaan 100 dhibcoodna waa laga jarayaa xadgudubyada gaarka ah ama arrimaha la helo.
scoring.overallScoreDesc: Dhibcaha guud waa isku-darka miisaanka leh ee dhammaan arrimaha falanqaynta, oo u dhexeeya 0 ilaa 100:
scoring.scoreRange1: 80-100: Aad u fiican - Diyaar u ah in la daabaco, macluumaadka si heer sare ah ayaa loo hagaajiyay
scoring.scoreRange2: 60-79: Wanaagsan - Horumar yar ayaa lagu taliyay ka hor inta aan la daabicin
scoring.scoreRange3: 40-59: Waxay u baahan tahay fiiro gaar ah - Dib u eegis iyo dib u eegis ayaa loo baahan yahay
scoring.scoreRange4: 0-39: Calaamadaysan - Arrimaha muhiimka ah, ha daabicin ilaa la xalliyo
scoring.overallCalcDesc: Dhibcaha guud waxay isticmaalaan miisaan la qabsi ah oo ku salaysan heerka khatarta:
scoring.overallCalc4: Khatar Halis ah (U hoggaansanaanta 40): Dhibcaha guud ee ugu badan waa 40
scoring.componentsDesc: Dhibcahaaga guud waxaa laga xisaabiyaa saddex qaybood oo muhiim ah iyadoo la adeegsanayo nidaam ku salaysan ganaax:
scoring.component1: Dhibcaha U Hoggaansanaanta: Waxay ka bilaabataa 100, waxayna ka jartaa dhibcaha xadgudub kasta oo la helo
scoring.component2: Dhibcaha Dareenka Dhaqanka: Celceliska 6da cabbir ee dhaqanka ee Hofstede
scoring.component3: Dhibcaha Saxnaanta: Waxay ka bilaabataa 100, waxayna ka jartaa dhibcaha khalad kasta ama dhibaato kasta oo la helo
scoring.complianceDetailDesc: Qoraal kasta wuxuu ku bilaabmaa Dhibcaha U hoggaansanaanta oo ah 100. Dhibcaha waxaa laga jarayaa xadgudub kasta:
scoring.complianceSeverity1: Xadgudub Halis ah (-60 dhibcood): jebinta NDA, shaacinta macluumaadka sirta ah  Khatarta joojinta degdegga ah
scoring.complianceSeverity2: Xadgudub Ba'an (-40 dhibcood): Dhibaatayn, takoorid, hadal nacayb ah  Khatarta dacwad sharci
scoring.complianceSeverity3: Xadgudub Sare (-25 dhibcood): Shaacinta xayaysiinta oo maqan, jebinta siyaasadda  Khatar ganaax/halis ah
scoring.complianceSeverity4: Xadgudub Dhexdhexaad ah (-10 dhibcood): Cod aan habboonayn, leexasho yar oo tilmaameed ah  Tababar/digniin
scoring.complianceSeverity5: Tusaale: Maqnaanshaha #ad (-25) + Arrinta laxanka (-10) = Dhibcaha kama dambaysta ah ee 65
scoring.complianceAdjustment: Xadgudubyo badan oo xadgudubyo ah - ciqaab kasta waxaa la adeegsadaa isugeyn ahaan
scoring.complianceViolationTypes: Xadgudubyada la hubiyay: Macluumaadka sirta ah, Dhibaataynta, jebinta NDA, Shaacinta maqan, Jebinta Siyaasadda, Cod aan habboonayn
scoring.culturalDetailDesc: Dhibcaha dhaqanku waa celceliska lix cabbir dhaqameed oo rasmi ah oo Hofstede ah (0-100 midkiiba):
scoring.culturalDim1: Masaafada Awoodda: Qaab-dhismeed, ixtiraamka maamulka iyo sinnaanta, codka caadiga ah
scoring.culturalDim2: Shakhsiyadda iyo Ururinta: Diiradda 'Aniga/Aniga' iyo Diiradda 'Aniga/Annaga' bulshada
scoring.culturalDim3: Ragga iyo Dumarka: Luqadda tartanka/caddeynta iyo tan iskaashiga/isku raacsanaanta
scoring.culturalDim4: Ka fogaanshaha Hubanti la'aanta: Xeerarka, badbaadada, caddaynta xoogga la saarayo iyo furfurnaanta mugdiga
scoring.culturalDim5: Jihaynta Muddada Dheer: Abaalmarinada mustaqbalka diiradda la saarayo iyo faa'iidooyinka muddada gaaban
scoring.culturalDim6: Raaxaysi iyo Xakameyn: Rajo wanaagsan/raaxo iyo luuqad la xakameeyey/la xakameeyey
scoring.culturalCalc: Dhibcaha Dhaqanka = (Wadarta 6 dhibcood oo cabbir ah)  6
scoring.culturalRisk: Marka Dhibcaha Dhaqanku ka hoos maro 50, miisaanka 'Khatarta Sumcadda' ayaa loo adeegsadaa si loo ilaaliyo sumcaddaada guud ahaan dhagaystayaasha adduunka oo dhan
scoring.accuracyDetailDesc: Qoraal kasta wuxuu ku bilaabmaa Dhibcaha Saxnaanta ee 100. Dhibcaha waxaa laga jarayaa arrimaha la helo:
scoring.accuracyCheck1: Khalad Weyn/Macluumaad Khaldan (-40 dhibcood): Sheegashooyin been abuur ah, xog la been abuuray
scoring.accuracyCheck2: Ilo aan la aamini karin (-20 dhibcood): Sheegashooyinka ka imanaya ilo aan la isku halleyn karin
scoring.accuracyCheck3: Sheegashada aan la xaqiijin karin (-10 dhibcood): Bayaanada aan la hubin karin xaqiiqadooda
scoring.accuracyCheck4: Tusaale: Sheegasho been ah (-40) + Ilo aan la xaqiijin (-20) = Dhibcaha kama dambaysta ah ee 40
scoring.accuracyCalc: Arimo badan oo isku xiran - ganaax kasta waxaa loo adeegsadaa si wadar ah
scoring.flagStatusDesc: Mawduuca si toos ah ayaa loo calaamadeeyaa iyadoo lagu saleynayo natiijooyinka falanqaynta:
scoring.flag1: Dabool wanaagsan (Cagaar): Dhibcaha ka sarreeya 80 - diyaar u ah in la daabaco
scoring.flag2: Waxay u baahan tahay feejignaan (Jaale): Dhibcaha 60-79 - horumarin yar ayaa lagu talinayaa
scoring.flag3: Loo calaamadeeyay dib u eegis (Liin): Dhibcaha 40-59 - dib u eegis ayaa loo baahan yahay ka hor inta aan la daabicin
scoring.flag4: Arrimaha Muhiimka ah (Casaan): Dhibcaha ka hooseeya 40 - ha daabicin ilaa la xalliyo
scoring.disclosureDesc: Wixii ku saabsan xayeysiiska, nidaamku wuxuu sidoo kale hubiyaa:
scoring.disclosure1: Waa Dhiirrigelin: Waxay ogaataa haddii waxyaabaha la xayeysiinayo ama la kafaala qaadayo
scoring.disclosure2: Shaacinta: Hubinta #xayeysiiska saxda ah, #la kafaala qaaday, ama shaacinta iskaashiga
scoring.disclosure3: U hoggaansanaanta Gobolka: Waxay xaqiijisaa shuruudaha shaacinta FTC (US), Midowga Yurub, iyo Norway
scoring.disclosure4: Shaacinta maqan waxay kicisaa Xadgudub Sare (-25 dhibcood) Dhibcaha U Hoggaansanaanta
scoring.tip: Dhibcaha dib ayaa loo xisaabiyaa mar kasta oo macluumaadka la falanqeeyo. Adeegso qaabka Dib-u-qorista si aad si toos ah u horumariso macluumaadka dhibcaha hooseeya inta aad ilaalinayso farriintaada.

analyze.intro: Habka shaqada ee Falanqaynta Mawduuca wuxuu kaa caawinayaa inaad qiimeyso waxyaabaha jira si loo ogaado u hoggaansanaanta, xasaasiyadda dhaqanka, iyo tayada ka hor intaadan daabicin.
analyze.stepsDesc: Raac tallaabooyinkan si aad u falanqeyso waxa ku jira:
analyze.step1: U gudub Sirdoonka Mawduuca > Falanqee tabka Mawduuca
analyze.step2: Ku dheji ama ku qor macluumaadkaaga qaybta qoraalka
analyze.step3: Dooro Astaan Istaraatiijiyadeed si aad u isticmaasho tilmaamaha astaantaada
analyze.step4: Haddii aad rabto AI inay abuurto muuqaal, si ikhtiyaari ah u calaamadee 'Samee sawirka la socda'
analyze.step5: Guji 'Falanqee' si aad u socodsiiso falanqaynta oo dhan
analyze.type1: Hubinta U hoggaansanaanta: Waxay xaqiijisaa macluumaadka iyadoo la raacayo siyaasadaha iyo qawaaniinta goobta (FTC, GDPR)
analyze.type2: Xasaasiyadda Dhaqanka: Sawirrada waxyaabaha laga yaabo inay waxyeello u geystaan ama dhaqan ahaan aan xasaasi ahayn
analyze.type3: Xaqiijinta Saxnaanta: Waxay hubisaa saxnaanta sheegashooyinka iyo xaqiiqooyinka
analyze.type4: Isku-dubaridka Summada: Waxay isbarbardhigtaa macluumaadka marka loo eego tilmaamahaaga Bogga Istaraatiijiga ah
analyze.tip: Adeegso badhanka 'Dib u qor' si aad si toos ah u horumariso macluumaadka ka hooseeya 70. AI-gu wuxuu wax ka qaban doonaa arrimaha calaamadaysan isagoo ilaalinaya farriintaada.

generate.intro: Habka shaqada ee Abuurista Mawduuca wuxuu adeegsadaa AI si uu u abuuro macluumaad cusub oo ku salaysan mowduucaaga, shuruudaha goobta, iyo tilmaamaha astaanta.
generate.step1: U gudub qaybta Sirdoonka Mawduuca > Soo Saarista Mawduuca
generate.step2: Geli mawduucaaga ama sharax waxaad rabto inaad abuurto
generate.step3: Dooro goobta aad bartilmaameedsanayso iyo codka qorista
generate.step4: Dooro Astaan Istaraatiijiyadeed si aad u hesho joogteynta summada
generate.step5: Guji 'Soo saar' si aad u abuurto macluumaad ku shaqeeya AI-ga
generate.optionsDesc: Ku habayn waxyaabaha aad soo saartay xulashooyinkan:
generate.option1: Xulashada Madal: Dooro hal ama dhowr goobood (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
generate.option2: Codka Qoraalka: Ka dooro Xirfadle, Caadi ah, Dhiirigelin leh, ama Macluumaad
generate.option3: Dhererka Mawduuca: Hagaaji dhererka bartilmaameedka ee macluumaadkaaga
generate.option4: Soo saarista Sawirka: Fur si aad u abuurto sawir la socda oo AI-soo saaray
generate.tip: Waxyaabaha la soo saaray si toos ah ayaa loo falanqeynayaa ka dib marka la sameeyo. Dib u eeg dhibcaha oo isticmaal badhamada jawaab celinta si aad dib ugu soo nooleyso haddii loo baahdo.

schedulePrompt.intro: Jadwalka Soo-jeedinta wuxuu kuu oggolaanayaa inaad dejiso soo-saarista macluumaadka otomaatiga ah oo ku shaqeeya waqtiyo cayiman, taasoo kaa dhigaysa jadwalkaaga mid buuxa iyada oo aan la faragelin gacanta.
schedulePrompt.howToDesc: Samee tilmaamo si toos ah u soo saara macluumaad:
schedulePrompt.step1: Samee su'aashaada soo saarista macluumaadka oo leh mowduuc iyo doorbidyo
schedulePrompt.step2: Deji inta jeer ee jadwalka la sameeyo (maalin kasta, toddobaadle, ama maalmo gaar ah)
schedulePrompt.step3: Dooro wakhtiga ay tahay in macluumaadka la soo saaro
schedulePrompt.step4: Daar 'Si otomaatig ah u falanqee' si aad si toos ah u socodsiiso falanqaynta waxyaabaha la soo saaray
schedulePrompt.benefit1: Ku hay qoraallo joogto ah adigoon maalin kasta shaqo gacmeed qaban
schedulePrompt.benefit2: Abuur waxyaabo inta lagu jiro saacadaha hal-abuurka ugu habboon
schedulePrompt.benefit3: Dhis diiwaan-gashan oo ku saabsan macluumaadka dib-u-eegista iyo ansixinta
schedulePrompt.tip: Dardaarannada la qorsheeyay waxay soo saaraan macluumaad qabyo-qoraalkaaga. Dib u eeg oo ansixi ka hor inta aan la daabicin si loo hubiyo tayada.

schedulePost.intro: Jadwalka Boostada wuxuu kuu oggolaanayaa inaad safka u gasho waxyaabaha la ansixiyay si loogu daabaco si otomaatig ah waqtiyada ugu habboon ee dhammaan aaladahaaga warbaahinta bulshada ee isku xiran.
schedulePost.step1: Marka laga eego aragti kasta oo ku saabsan macluumaadka, dhagsii 'Jadwalka' halkii aad ka riixi lahayd 'Daabac Hadda'
schedulePost.step2: Dooro taariikhda iyo waqtiga aad bartilmaameedsanayso ee daabacaadda
schedulePost.step3: Dooro goobaha bulshada ee isku xiran si aad ugu daabacdo
schedulePost.step4: Xaqiiji oo ku dar safkaaga jadwalka ku jira
schedulePost.option1: Waqti Gaar ah: Dooro taariikh iyo waqti sax ah oo aad ku daabacdo
schedulePost.option2: Waqtiga ugu Fiican: U ogolow AI inay soo jeediso waqtiyada ugu habboon ee la soo dhejin karo iyadoo lagu saleynayo xogta ka-qaybgalka
schedulePost.option3: Madal Badan: Jadwal u samee isla macluumaadka ku jira madal badan hal mar
schedulePost.warning: Qoraallada jadwalka leh waxay u baahan yihiin ugu yaraan hal akoon oo warbaahinta bulshada ah oo isku xiran. Ku xidh akoonnada Dejinta > Bogagga Bulshada.

approval.intro: Socodka Shaqada ee Ansixinta wuxuu hubiyaa tayada macluumaadka isagoo u baahan dib u eegis maamule ka hor inta aan la daabicin. Tani waxay si gaar ah muhiim ugu tahay kooxaha ganacsiga iyo warshadaha la nidaamiyay.
approval.processDesc: Sida tusmadu ugu socoto habka oggolaanshaha:
approval.step1: Abuuruhu wuxuu soo gudbiyaa macluumaadka isagoo gujinaya 'Gudbi si loo Ansixiyo'
approval.step2: Mawduucu wuxuu ka muuqdaa safka Ansixinta maamulaha
approval.step3: Maamuluhu wuxuu dib u eegayaa nuxurka, dhibcaha, iyo natiijooyinka falanqaynta
approval.step4: Maamuluhu wuu ansixiyaa, wuu codsadaa isbeddello, ama wuu diidaa waxa ku jira
approval.status1: Qabyo-qoraal: Mawduuca ayaa laga shaqeynayaa, weli lama soo gudbin
approval.status2: Ansixinta Sugeysa: La gudbiyay oo la sugayo dib u eegista maamulaha
approval.status3: La Ansixiyay: Diyaar u ah in la daabaco ama la jadwaleeyo
approval.status4: Dib-u-eegis Baahsan: Maamuluhu wuxuu codsaday isbeddello - hubi jawaab celinta oo dib u soo gudbi
approval.tip: Ku dar qoraallo marka aad gudbinayso macluumaadka si aad u siiso dib u eegista macnaha guud ee ku saabsan go'aannadaada hal-abuurka leh. Tani waxay dedejinaysaa habka oggolaanshaha.

twoFactorAuth.backupCodesDescription: Koodhkan ku kaydi meel ammaan ah. Waxaad u isticmaali kartaa inaad gasho akoonkaaga haddii aad lumiso qofka kuu xaqiijinaya.

gdpr.cookieDescription: Waxaan isticmaalnaa cookies si aan u horumarinno khibradaada daalacashada, u adeegno macluumaadka shaqsiyeed, iyo inaan falanqeyno taraafikadayada. Markaad gujiso "Aqbal Dhammaan", waxaad ogolaatay isticmaalka cookies-ka. Waxaad habayn kartaa doorbidyadaada ama waad diidi kartaa cookies-ka aan muhiimka ahayn.
gdpr.essentialCookiesDesc: Loo baahan yahay xaqiijinta, amniga, iyo shaqada aasaasiga ah. Lama damin karo.
gdpr.analyticsCookiesDesc: Naga caawi inaan fahanno sida booqdayaashu ula falgalaan madalkeenna si aan u horumarinno adeegyadayada.
gdpr.marketingCookiesDesc: Waxaa loo isticmaalaa in lagu bixiyo xayeysiisyo shaqsiyeed iyo in lagu cabbiro waxtarka ololaha.
